subject: p16508811
History: Fever and cough, status post renal transplant. History of smoking.
Findings: PA and lateral views of the chest. There are new opacities in the superior segment of the left lower lobe and in the right lower lobe, most consistent with multifocal pneumonia. No pleural effusion or pneumothorax. Cardiomediastinal and hilar contours are normal.
Impression: New multifocal pneumonia in the right and left lower lobes. These findings were discussed with Dr. By Dr. At 1:45 pm. On by telephone at the time of discovery.
